main event: A civilian observation of unidentified flying objects occurred in Roswell, New Mexico on February 6, 1952.
interesting points: The report mentions a sighting of a greenish-blue ball of fire by a B-29 crew while flying in Roswell,New Mexico.,The object was described as circular and metallic, with a diameter of approximately 40 to 50 feet.,One report speculated the phenomenon was a 'ball of fire' instead of traditional flying saucer sightings.,The objects were reported to display unusual maneuverability, including vertical ascents.,There were multiple sightings reported in various states around the same time.
witness description: crew members of B-29 aircraft and civilians
